entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Matapedia
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
